references.paper_title: Break-a-scene: Extracting multiple concepts from a single image
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for extracting multiple concepts from a single image, which is relevant to the task of imitative image editing.

references.paper_title: Instructpix2pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper introduces a new method for image editing that allows users to provide instructions in the form of text, which is a relevant approach to the task of imitative image editing.

references.paper_title: Masactrl: Tuning-free mutual self-attention control for consistent image synthesis and editing
references.reason: This paper presents a novel approach to image synthesis and editing that uses mutual self-attention, which is a technique that could be used to improve the performance of imitative image editing models.
This paper introduces a new method for object-level image customization, which is a closely related task to imitative image editing.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a new method for high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, which is a technique that is used in the proposed imitative image editing model.
